tutorials.title: Adding Attachments and Comments to Your Issue

tile.name: Adding Attachments and Comments to Your Issue
tile.description: Use the Issues REST API to add documents, images, and comments to an issue.

tile.name: Changed Elements API Tutorial
tile.description: This tutorial will teach you how to use the Changed Elements API to visualize change in your iTwin Application

tutorials.title: Copy Project Team Members and Roles to another Project

tile.name: Copy Project Team Members and Roles to another Project
tile.description: This tutorial will demonstrate how to copy team members and roles from one Project to another.

tile.name: Create & Query Projects
tile.description: This tutorial will guide you through the process of creating and querying projects

tile.name: Create an empty iModel
tile.description: Walk-through how to create an empty iModel which later can be used for synchronization.

tile.name: Create iModel Named Version
tile.description: Walk-through how to create a new Named Version within existing iModel.

tutorials.title: Create a test iModel from a Bentley provided sample

tile.name: Create a test iModel from a Bentley provided sample
tile.description: The quickest way to get access to a cloud hosted iModel is by creating an iModel seeded with Bentley provided sample data.

tile.name: Creating Your First Issue
tile.description: Learn the basics of the Issues REST API by creating, viewing, and modifying an issue.

tile.name: Import Users into Project
tile.description: This tutorial will demonstrate how to add users to a Project from a CSV file.

tile.name: Manage Project Team Members
tile.description: This tutorial will guide you through the process of managing project team members

tutorials.title: React to iModel events using Webhooks API

tile.name: React to iModel events using Webhooks API
tile.description: This tutorial will teach you how to use Webhooks API to subscribe to iModel events and introduce basic event handling workflows.

tile.name: Register and modify an Application
tile.description: Before you can start using iTwin Platform REST APIs you need to create an application. This tutorial covers basic application registration and modification steps.

tile.name: Stepping Through an Issue Workflow
tile.description: Use a workflow to track the status of an issue created through the Issues REST API.

tile.name: Get started with Storage API
tile.description: This tutorial is introduction to Storage API explaining main workflows and operations.

tutorials.title: Synchronize a file from iTwin Storage

tile.name: Synchronize a file from iTwin Storage
tile.description: Walk-through how to synchronize a file from iTwin Storage to an iModel using Synchronization API.

tile.name: Export data from an iModel
tile.description: This tutorial guides you through exporting data from an iModel to other formats, such as IFC or LandXM using the Export API.

tile.name: Get started with ContextCapture API
tile.description: This tutorial is an introduction to ContextCapture API, explaining the basic workflows.

tile.name: Using cache in ContextCapture API
tile.description: This tutorial focuses on using cache for faster processing in ContextCapture

tile.name: Better calibration in ContextCapture
tile.description: Learn how to specify calibration settings in ContextCapture, and download the result of a calibration

tile.name: Better production in ContextCapture
tile.description: Learn how to specify production settings in ContextCapture

tile.name: Get started with RealityData API
tile.description: This tutorial is an introduction to RealityData API, explaining the basic workflows.

tile.name: Property Validation Basics
tile.description: Walk-through to create property validation rules and tests and then run them and get the results.

tile.name: Create Multi-Property Validation Rule
tile.description: Walk-through to create a multi-property validation rule.

tile.name: Clash Suppression Rules Basics
tile.description: Walk-through of the creation and usage of suppression rules for clash detection tests.

tile.name: Clash Test Basics
tile.description: Walk-through of the clash detection lifecycle-creating, running and retrieving the results.

tile.name: Retrieve Validation Model Data
tile.description: Walk-through of the retrieving and understanding basic model information needed for various validation functions.

tutorials.title: Creating an Insights Report using iModel Data

tile.name: Creating an Insights Report using iModel Data
tile.description: This tutorial will teach you how to create an Insights Report using iModel data.

tutorials.title: Running the Design Element Classification ML Pipeline on an iModel

tile.name: Running the Design Element Classification ML Pipeline on an iModel
tile.description: Walk-through how to run your iModel against the Design Element Classification ML Model and and get Results.

tutorials.title: Transforming an iModel - Filtering data by a view definition

tile.name: Transforming an iModel - Filtering data by a view definition
tile.description: This tutorial will demonstrate how to filter an iModel by a view definition using iModel Transformations API.

tile.name: Upload Component to a Catalog
tile.description: This tutorial will guide you through the process of uploading a component to a catalog in an organization.

tutorials.title: Query and Download Component from a Catalog

tile.name: Query and Download Component from a Catalog
tile.description: This tutorial will guide you through the process of querying a component from a catalog in an organization.

tile.name: Create a Component
tile.description: This tutorial will guide you through the process of creating a component in an organization.

tile.name: Authorize Single-Page Application (SPA)
tile.description: This tutorial will show you how to register a Single-Page Application (SPA), get an access token with it, and use it.

tile.name: Authorize Native Application
tile.description: This tutorial will show you how to register a Native Application, get an access token with it, and use it.

tile.name: Get Access Token with Service application
tile.description: This tutorial will provide you information how to authorize.

tile.name: Authorize Web Application
tile.description: This tutorial will show you how to register a Web Application, get an access token with it, and use it.

tutorials.title: Exporting iModel to Unreal Datasmith as a combined mesh

tile.name: Exporting iModel to Unreal Datasmith as a combined mesh
tile.description: Follow this tutorial to get iModel data into the Datasmith format as a combined mesh.

tile.name: 1 - Start building a Viewer App
tile.description: This quick start is intended to help you get started with using iTwin Platform visualization components. By the end of this walk-through, you will be able to build and run a web application for viewing an infrastructure digital twin (iTwin).

tile.name: 2 - Customizing the iTwin Viewer - "The Basics"
tile.description: This tutorial will take you through the first steps of customizing your iTwin Web Viewer. First you will learn how to add a new user interface component. Later you will customize that component to change the background color of your viewer.

firstStepTutorials.title: Adding showcase widgets to your iTwin Viewer

tile.name: 3 - Adding showcase widgets to your iTwin Viewer
tile.description: This tutorial will take widgets from the sample showcase and add them into your iTwin Viewer using the `uiProviders` prop.

preloadedApis.description:
Reporting is a resource for aggregating iTwin data to build custom dashboards and integrate iTwin data with your business applications.

- Create digitial twin based reports which can be consumed through business intelligence applications such as Power BI.
- Leverage the OData feed Data Access to generate reports by combining data from multiple data streams in the digital twin.
